import React from 'react'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Button, Col, Form, Input, Label, Row, } from 'reactstrap'; import { regAction } from '../../../redux/actions/UserActions'; export default function AuthPage() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const err = useSelector((store) => store.err); return ( <>
dispatch(regAction(e, Object.fromEntries(new FormData(e.target))))}>
{' '} {err && (
{err.message}
)} ); }
